messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We currently have cultists on our station. Please report any news to heads

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that all of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that all of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Technical Storage.

messages.author: Bumps (Chief Engineer)
messages.body:
Our local chef making shit food on our station.
Now lots of our staff here have been wanting a chef on our station to make us lots of different food, but the real fact is. Our chef can only make salad. What type of chef is that? I know right, outragerous that such a man could be hired as a chef.

Psst: He was also seen smashing lights after hearing a voice in their head, what a creep

comments.author: Helps-The-Station (Cargo Technician)
comments.body: Hurry up nerd lemme in the crate room

messages.author: Bumps (Chief Engineer)
messages.body:
We have a new issue on our station, some demonic voice keeps telling crew to destroy lights. This is a major issue for our lives, I wish to live in both peace without demons and in bright lights. Who ever this vile demon is who keeps detroying my BRIGHT LIGHTS WILL PAY.

If you have any imformation about this subject please send a PDA message to Bumps.

messages.author: Bumps (Chief Engineer)
messages.body:
Warden locked in his own locker?

This kinky mother fucker decided to play hoodi with himself by locking himself in his own locker, to this very moment this is posted. HE IS STILL INSIDE THE LOCKER.
This man could be doing all sorts of mad shit in there while trying to get out, for all we know he could even be dead!
What I suspect is he's having a nice lizard wank in that locker, it's best we don't find out.

P.S I eat a part of his jacket

messages.author: Carl (AI)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">A crew member with an infection was placed in permanent containment where they shorty broke out through a broken window. It is currently unknown how the disease is spread but it is suspected the disease is spread by contact and fluids.</font>
